90313.「衣装を かえるのね！\n それじゃ 何を着たらいいかしら？\n<break>:
You'd like me to change my outfit!
Which one should I wear?
<break>

90316.「剣を かえるのね！\n どれを 装備すればいいの？\n<break>:
You'd like me to change swords, I see!
Which one should I use?
<break>

90317.「あら やめておくのね。\n それじゃ どれを装備する？\n<break>:
Oh, changed your mind?
Which one should I equip, then?
<break>

90319.「盾を かえるのね！\n どれを 装備すればいいの？\n<break>:
You want me to switch shields, I see!
Which one should I use?
<break>

90320.「あら やめておくのね。\n それじゃ どれを装備する？\n<break>:
Oh, changed your mind?
Which one should I equip, then?
<break>

90938.新品の装備品です！\n他人に渡せなくなりますが よろしいですか？\n<yesno:
This is brand new equipment!
If equipped, it cannot be given to other
players. Proceed?
<yesno 2><close>

90939.「あら？ 私が装備できるものを\n 持っていないみたい。\n<end>:
Hmm... It looks like you don't have anything
I'm able to equip.
<end>

90942.「私が装備できる 衣装を持っていないみたい。\n もし すてきな衣装が手に入った:
You don't have any outfits I can wear.
If you find a nice one, please bring it to
me, won't you?
<end>

91331.アンルシアが装備している\n<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>を は:
Remove the <%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>
that Anlucia has equipped?
<yesno 2><close>

93539.「あらっ？ その衣装なら\n ちょうど今 着ているものよ。\n<bw_break:
Huh? That's the outfit I already have on!
<bw_break>

93725.「私の装備を かえるのね。\n 何を かえたらいいかしら？\n<break>:
You want me to change equipment?
What should I use instead?
<break>

93792.「ほかに 何を かえたらいいかしら？\n<break>:
Is there anything else I should change?
